Store.nftDelayTip: If you don’t receive the membership within 10 minutes after purchase, please contact admin

gpu.gpuRentalDescription: You can rent gaming computers from nearby cybercafes or individuals. Once connected, you can play all games supported by the platform. Flexible rental, fast startup, great for instant gaming. Supports hourly billing, remote access to gaming computers, play whitelisted games directly (such as PUBG, GTA5). Note: Devices are only for gaming, other uses are not supported.
gpu.title: Tip
gpu.description: Here you can rent shared gaming computers and play supported games instantly. Rentals are short-term, quick to start. You can rent hourly and log in remotely to play whitelisted games (PUBG, GTA5, etc.). Note: Computers are for gaming only. Latency increases significantly if machine distance exceeds 500km, choose wisely. Default is 500km.
gpu.distanceWarning: If machine distance exceeds 500km, latency increases significantly, please choose carefully
gpu.noGPUData: No data for this GPU type
gpu.description2: You can rent gaming computers from shared cybercafes, enjoy the same privileges and experience as cybercafe gaming. Since it includes special privileges, the rental price is relatively higher.
gpu.game_tip: After renting a machine, you can scan the Steam QR code to play PC games. Note: latency increases significantly if machine distance exceeds 500km, please choose carefully.
gpu.noGpuMachinesHere: No GPU machines available in this area
gpu.tips: If machine distance exceeds 500km, latency increases significantly, please choose carefully

remote.passwordAlphaNumeric: Password must contain both letters and numbers
remote.connectAndActivateFlow: Mobile remote connection to PC requires purchasing and activating membership in the store

IsWallet.t2: Create your exclusive account, easily obtain and manage DeepLink points to enjoy cloud gaming services and start high-quality gaming anytime.
IsWallet.walletNftAccessTip: After logging in, you can purchase Pro Crown membership to unlock advanced features. View details.
IsWallet.walletBuyTokensTip: After logging in, you can purchase DeepBrainChain Coin and DeepLink Coin.
IsWallet.walletPurchaseServicesTip: After logging in, you can purchase cloud gaming or other services.
IsWallet.walletClaimRewardsTip: After logging in, you can claim DeepLink Coin rewards.
IsWallet.walletShareGpuTip: After logging in, you can share GPU and earn DLC rewards. Your device must be equipped with Nvidia 20 series or higher graphics cards to participate. For more details, please see:

createWallet.walletPasswordReminder: Please remember your password! If lost, you cannot recover it. You need the password and private key to open the account.

walletSuccess.privateKeyStorageTip: Please store your private key file in a safe place. It is recommended to write it down on paper and keep the paper copy secure.
walletSuccess.doNotLoseIt: Do not lose it! Once lost, it cannot be recovered.
walletSuccess.doNotSendIt: Do not send your private key through social media or messaging apps (WeChat, QQ, Facebook, Line, KakaoTalk, WhatsApp). If used on phishing sites, your assets
walletSuccess.backupReminder: Please back up your file! Treat it as a million-dollar asset.

openWallet.walletPasswordReminder: Please remember your password! If lost, you cannot recover it. You need the password and private key to open the account.
openWallet.enterPrivateKey: Please enter your account private key
openWallet.invalidPrivateKey: Please enter a valid 64-character hexadecimal private key
openWallet.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
openWallet.passwordAlphaNumeric: Password must contain both letters and numbers

shareGpu.shareToEarn: By sharing my computer, I can earn DLC rewards online.
shareGpu.earnWithoutRenting: With this sharing method, you can earn rewards even if the computer is not rented.
shareGpu.hardwareRequirement: Requirement: GPU must be NVIDIA 20 series or above, with at least 16GB memory.
shareGpu.rewardExample: Example: At the current DLC price, a device with RIX 4070 GPU and 32GB memory can earn up to $2921 per month in online rewards.
shareGpu.rentBonus: If the device is rented, rewards will increase by an additional $3096.
shareGpu.rentalHoursNote: Based on 12 hours of rental per day.
shareGpu.infoSectionTitle: Current global online GPU node count:
shareGpu.nftDescription: With mining node membership, you can rent out your computer to earn DLC rewards. Each membership also comes with an extra 30,000 DLC airdrop reward.
shareGpu.competitionDescription: Currently, membership holders can participate in the Orion short-term rental incentive competition, lasting 6 months, with total rewards up to 1 billion DLC.
shareGpu.earn_rental_income: Earn rental income by sharing your computer.
shareGpu.requirements: Requirement: NVIDIA 20 series or above GPU, minimum 16GB memory.
shareGpu.sharing_method: With this sharing method, no node membership or DBC staking is required, but rewards are not fixed—only when your computer is rented will you receive payment.
shareGpu.example: Example: A computer with RTX 4070 GPU and 32GB memory can earn $0.1668 per hour in rental income.
shareGpu.feature_development: This feature is under development, stay tuned!
shareGpu.deeplink_notice: Sharing computers in cybercafe mode requires DeepLink official approval before going online, please fill in the information accurately.
shareGpu.verification_code_sent: Verification code has been sent to your email
shareGpu.rules_rental_bonus: When machine is rented, rewards increase by 30%
shareGpu.gpu_requirements: GPU limited to Nvidia 20 series or higher, memory above 16GB
shareGpu.staking_requirements: Each machine requires a fixed stake of 1000 DBC. You can choose to stake any amount of DLC; the more you stake, the more rewards. Reference:
shareGpu.nft_staking_requirements: Each machine requires at least 1 mining node membership, up to 20. Staking 20 memberships yields 20x the reward of 1. Buy membership:
shareGpu.pre_rental_warning: Before renting out your computer, you must complete these 3 steps: (If not followed strictly, data leaks or system issues may occur, and the owner bears full responsibility!)
shareGpu.delete_personal_files: 1. Completely delete all personal files (photos/documents/passwords, etc.) to prevent privacy leaks!
shareGpu.install_steam: 2. Install Steam software (must install, otherwise machine cannot earn rewards)
shareGpu.install_games: 3. Pre-install at least 3 popular AAA games, such as: Red Dead Redemption 2, GTA 5, Black Myth: Wukong, Elden Ring, GTA 6, Assassin’s Creed Odyssey, Cyberpunk 2077, God of War: Ragnarök, Hogwarts Legacy
shareGpu.machine_list_refresh: The machine list refreshes every 10 minutes. If no change, refresh manually to view updates.
